Package trains

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Arc
    This class is an object based representation of a Petri network arc.
    Parser
    This class handles XML related functions for loading a Perti Network XML is obtained and created using the popular XStream serializer
    PetriMap
    Object based representation of a Petri network (map)
    PetriThread
    Custom runnable object to simulate the behavior of a Petri Network activity.
    Place
    This class in an object based representation of a Petri network place
    Trains
    Main runnable class for running the "Train" simulation -Contains the static main(String[] args)
    Transition
    This class in an object based representation of a Petri network transition
    Util
    Utilities class for printing data
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Arc.Type
    Type of arc -Normal: Standard Petri Network Arc -Inhibitor: Arc that stops a transition from firing if it's input place contains tokens -Test: Arc that mimics the normal arc without actually firing tokens
    Transition.TimeMode
    TimeMode -Immediate: Tokens are fired asap -Random: A random time is selected before the tokens are fired -Deterministic: Value determined by the "timeToFire" attribute
